blocks.headline: TinaCMS is a perfect match for agencies.
blocks.text: Treat your clients to an amazing editor experience to go along with your beautiful websites.

blocks.content:
## Go above and beyond for your clients

Leverage TinaCMS to deliver top-tier websites with an intuitive interface for content management. Stay ahead of the competition.

items.headline: Visual Editing
items.text: TinaCMS provides an unmatched visual editing experience compared to other CMSs.

items.headline: Customizable Interface
items.text: Deliver tailored CMS experiences that suit your clients' brand and needs.

items.headline: Leverage Git
items.text: Since TinaCMS is a Git-backed CMS, it comes with the best version-control on the planet. Say goodbye to the fear of breaking changes and hello to a stress-free development process.

items.headline: Accelerate Development
items.text: TinaCMS allows you to accelerate development by reusing existing templates and components. Tina's configuration is set up through code, so once you build a template you like, it can easily be reused to spin up new projects for new clients.

blocks.headline: Let's talk!
blocks.text: Interested in using TinaCMS for your agency? We'd love to chat!

seo.title: Agencies
seo.description: Unleash the potential of your agency with TinaCMS. Simplify website development and content management for your clients.
